Deep Learning in Production

This book provides an introduction to deep learning and its applications in production environments, covering topics such as machine learning, data engineering, model engineering, DevOps engineering, and setting up a deep learning workstation.

Key Concepts:

  • Designing a Machine Learning System
  • Setting up a Deep Learning Workstation
  • Distributed training
  • Data vs model parallelism
  • MLOps
  • TFX Pipeline
  • Vertex AI
  • Google Cloud
  • Deep Learning in Production
deep learning production machine learning system design devops cloud computing Tensorboard model validation Machine Learning Data Validation
